story.name: Riley
story.text: Hey kid, been awhile hasn't it?

story.name: You
story.text: Sorry, but I'm not sure who...

story.name: Riley
story.text: Yeah we probably haven't crossed paths much. Interns tend to get sattled with research, not security concerns.

story.name: Riley
story.text: The name's Riley. I'm in charge of making sure the network and systems aren't attacked... and before you ask, the weapons are so the crew can defend themselves in case of emergency.

story.name: Riley
story.text: Man what a mess we've got here. What even happened? I was just fixing the door systems and suddenly the alarms were going off.

choices: I'm not really sure, it all happened so fast I'm still reeling from it.
The base flooded! But I don't know from what.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Well that makes two of us.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Well I guess I'm lucky this room isn't worse off then.

story.name: Riley
story.text: Looks like the room only flooded a little. Let's check the cameras and see how the rest of the base is doing.

story.name: Riley
story.text: Shit! Looks like the camera got flooded... weird since they're in waterproof cases. Looks like we're running blind for now.

story.name: Riley
story.text: Hey, If I give you these broken cameras maybe you can them over to the engineer later?

story.name: You
story.text: Sure... though I don't exactly know where they are.

story.name: You
story.text: I'm still finding my way around...

story.name: Riley
story.text: Don't worry, you won't miss their lab.

story.name: Riley
story.text: I assume you used the stasis pod in HQ... how's it looking in there?

choices: HQ? Lucky for me, very dry.
Unscathed! Which wturned out to be a good thing for me.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Lucky? What, your statsis pod fail or something?

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Ah. Lucky you then.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Well, I suppose we have to assume the rest of the rooms are flooded.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Hey, you haven't happened to have seen a little robot rolling around, have you? About a foot tall... annoying as hell.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: A good thing? Dry equiptment sure is a good thing. They had you working out of HQ right? Or were you in a lab.

responses.name: You
responses.text: Mostly the biology lab. But I got lucky being in HQ when I was. Too bad my pod malfunctioned and spit me out too early.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: I see... well lucky you then.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Not to change the subject but you haven't happened to see a little robot buzzing around, have you? He's a bit of a short and annoying fellow...

story.name: You
story.text: Oh you mean Lil Jacob?

story.name: Riley
story.text: That's the one.

story.name: You
story.text: He actually was the one who checked out my pod for me.

story.name: Riley
story.text: Hmph. Yeah I'm sure he did a great job repairing it too.

story.name: You
story.text: Well no...

story.name: Riley
story.text: Useless robot. I don't even know why the crew keeps him around.

story.name: You
story.text: Hey he's... cute, I guess.

story.name: You
story.text: Oh! He also said something... something about threats... oh, what was it?

story.name: Riley
story.text: It probably wasn't important. That robot gets scared of worms kid.

story.name: You
story.text: Worms! That's it!

story.name: You
story.text: He said the base is crawling with things much bigger than worms!

story.name: Riley
story.text: Hmm, I suppose some animals may have got in with the breach. Too bad the cameras are down or else we'd have a better angle on what.

story.name: Riley
story.text: I suppose if we want to get the rest of the base opeerational we'd have to get them out...

story.name: Riley
story.text: Say kid, you said you did biology right?

choices: Yeah... where are eyou going with this?

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: I think I know how we can clear the base. We just need someone who knows how to manually override the doors - me - and someone who can handle the animals - you.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: See, the problem with an inhospitable room is that the systems force the doors closed to so no one can enter and get hurt.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: In tandem with the stasis pods, it lets us survive down here until help arrives. But since we're both awake now...

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Well we have to eat, don't we?

responses.name: You
responses.text: I take it this means we need to make the rest of the rooms safe to enter.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Exactly. I knew there was a reason they made you the intern.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Nevermind, don't tell me then. It's not like we need the rest of the base operational to survive.

responses.name: You
responses.text: Don't they have failsafees for this?

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Kid, this was the failsafe. The alarms blare, the crew goes into stasis, and the doors lock to keep anyone out of uninhabitable areas.

responses.name: Riley
responses.text: Unfortunately for us, we need to make those areas habitable for ourselves again.

story.name: Riley
story.text: We'll need to work together to wake up the rest of the crew.

story.name: You
story.text: So how do we open the doors?

story.name: Riley
story.text: The only way to manually override them is from here... meaning I'll have to stay here.

story.name: Riley
story.text: There should be a valve in each room where you can flush out any of the water. The base should've manually done so but...

story.name: Riley
story.text: Well that might be something to ask the engineer about.

story.name: You
story.text: Another thing to pass on to them I guess.

story.name: Riley
story.text: After you flush each room, make sure to wake up the crew member. Just the two of us can't run this base ourselves.

story.name: You
story.text: Sure... only there's one problem with this plan.

story.name: Riley
story.text: What's that?

story.name: You
story.text: I can't exactly breathe under water.

story.name: Riley
story.text: Funny you should say that.

story.name: Riley
story.text: Go check HQ, I'm sure theres some extra scuba suits lying around.

story.name: Riley
story.text: Not like anyone knows how to clean up after themselves in this goddamn place.

story.name: Riley
story.text: Maybe today that'll finally come in useful.
